response.original_title: Flip-Flop And Rock! Or... It's Ruff To Be Puff!
response.overview: Chip's dream of becoming a real boy becomes reality! It's a hilarious, fun filled, musical journey as Chip, Gem and the band race across Rocky Ridge from a live concert to their first major TV appearance, searching for Chip’s trusty rock-hound, "Ruff" played by Chanda-Leah – “The World’s Smartest Dog.” Viewers will laugh and learn about friendship and God's love as the God Rocks! take a fun ride across the town of Rocky Ridge performing songs and searching for Chip’s dog, Ruff.  DVD Extras include: 3 New music videos, 4 God Rocks! Kareoke Songs, Special Features – “On the Road with God Rocks!” and “Meet Chanda-Leah, The World’s Smartest Dog” and more!
response.title: Flip-Flop And Rock! Or... It's Ruff To Be Puff!

titles.title: God Rocks!: Flip-Flop And Rock! Or... It's Ruff To Be Puff!
